title: How to Get Wings in Spore

steps.headline: Complete the cell stage in spore.
steps.description: If you have completed this stage on another game, go straight to the wild animal stage when choosing your planet. (If you wish to add wings to a creature you already started, skip this step. If the creature you already started is in the tribal stage or higher, you can not alter their appearance other than clothes. Wings will be available as clothing in the space outfitter.)

steps.headline: Go into the creature creator for the wild creature stage.
steps.description: Do not confuse with the early creature creator as they are separate and only the wild creature creator will give wings as an option.

steps.headline: Click on the last icon at the top of the page.
steps.description: If you roll your mouse over it, a text box that says "Detail" should appear.

steps.headline: At the bottom of the page, there will be a wing that looks like the wing of an insect.
steps.description: Drag it on to your creature. It now has wings. (Note: If you do not see the wings, you have to look for skeletons)

steps.headline: If you find these wings unappealing, wear them until you find more.
steps.description: These will cost more, but are stronger. There are four types of wings, each carry you for different distances.

text: Complete the cell stage in spore. If you have completed this stage on another game, go straight to the wild animal stage when choosing your planet. (If you wish to add wings to a creature you already started, skip this step. If the creature you already started is in the tribal stage or higher, you can not alter their appearance other than clothes. Wings will be available as clothing in the space outfitter.) Go into the creature creator for the wild creature stage. Do not confuse with the early creature creator as they are separate and only the wild creature creator will give wings as an option. Click on the last icon at the top of the page. If you roll your mouse over it, a text box that says "Detail" should appear. At the bottom of the page, there will be a wing that looks like the wing of an insect. Drag it on to your creature. It now has wings. (Note: If you do not see the wings, you have to look for skeletons) If you find these wings unappealing, wear them until you find more. These will cost more, but are stronger. There are four types of wings, each carry you for different distances.
